channel.title: CVE Feed for Emerson -- WirelessHART Gateway
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Emerson -- WirelessHART Gateway

item.title: CVE-2021-42539|2024-08-04T03:30:38.319Z -- emerson -- wirelesshart%20gateway
item.description: The affected product is vulnerable to a missing permission validation on system backup restore, which could lead to account take over and unapproved settings change.

item.title: CVE-2021-38485|2024-08-04T01:44:22.923Z -- emerson -- wirelesshart%20gateway
item.description: The affected product is vulnerable to improper input validation in the restore file. This enables an attacker to provide malicious config files to replace any file on disk.

item.title: CVE-2021-42542|2024-08-04T03:38:49.426Z -- emerson -- wirelesshart%20gateway
item.description: The affected product is vulnerable to directory traversal due to mishandling of provided backup folder structure.

item.title: CVE-2021-42540|2024-08-04T03:30:38.336Z -- emerson -- wirelesshart%20gateway
item.description: The affected product is vulnerable to a unsanitized extract folder for system configuration. A low-privileged user can leverage this logic to overwrite the settings and other key functionality.

item.title: CVE-2021-42538|2024-08-04T03:30:38.491Z -- emerson -- wirelesshart%20gateway
item.description: The affected product is vulnerable to a parameter injection via passphrase, which enables the attacker to supply uncontrolled input.

item.title: CVE-2021-42536|2024-08-04T03:30:38.286Z -- emerson -- wirelesshart%20gateway
item.description: The affected product is vulnerable to a disclosure of peer username and password by allowing all users access to read global variables.
